comments.body: mind plumbing `t` here so we can `t.Logf` a message about the resolved pkgPath, and adding a comment about the environment this is enabling? (same for the other instance)
Is there an alternative to this? What does this assume about the working directory of the test?
it is the positions of this file, i.e. the fixtures are next to it. This avoid that we need `n` fixtures for  `n` test packages using this test server.
